name: wgsim

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
Wgsim is a small tool for simulating sequence reads from a reference
genome. It is able to simulate diploid genomes with SNPs and
insertion/deletion (INDEL) polymorphisms, and simulate reads with
uniform substitution sequencing errors. It does not generate INDEL
sequencing errors, but this can be partly compensated by simulating
INDEL polymorphisms.

dependencies.name: zlib-api
dependencies.description:
A free, general-purpose, legally unencumbered lossless data-compression
library.
